long_description: This GoPro side mount lets you attach your GoPro camera (sold separately) to the side of a vehicle, helmet or other gear with 3-way pivoting adjustability to make aiming easy. Comes with a curved adhesive mount; sticky 3M backing sticks tenaciously to curved surfaces, yet is easy to remove when heat is applied, such as with a hair dryer.
short_description: This GoPro side mount lets you attach your GoPro camera (sold separately) to the side of a vehicle, helmet or other gear with 3-way pivoting adjustability to make aiming easy.
